short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform any web table into an interactive, sortable spreadsheet with Table Turner.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any web table into an interactive and sortable table with Table Turner. This Chrome extension enhances your browsing experience by adding instant sorting capabilities to tables on any webpage. 

Easily organize data, compare information, and find what you need faster. Perfect for students, researchers, and professionals who frequently work with online data tables.
